DOC.brief_summary: Hypothesis of this study is that mindfulness meditation would decrease the severity of obsessive-compulsive symptoms.
DOC.brief_title: Effect of Mindfulness Based Treatment for Obsessive-compulsive Disorder
DOC.detailed_description: Before and after 8 weeks of mindfulness program, We will measure Y-BOCS scores in OCD patients. As a control program, relaxation and psychoeducation will provided to OCD patients.
DOC.criteria: obsessivecompulsive disorder age 1755 currently undergoing Cognitive Behavioral Therapy, psychotherapy other medical disease
